title: Samim Arif
subtitle: Today Afghans grieve the killing of Dr. Tetsu Nakamura in Jalalabad. He was an aid worker who dedicated his life to helping Afghan refugees, and building irrigation canals to bring relief to drought stricken areas in eastern AFG. RIP Nakamura, we will not forget your services. pic.twitter.com/Duq9IP3dUG
